thread.title: 'Back to the Future' Honors the Past With Soundtrack Reissue
thread.title_full: 'Back to the Future' Honors the Past With Soundtrack Reissue

title: 'Back to the Future' Honors the Past With Soundtrack Reissue
text:
'Back to the Future' Honors the Past ... 'Back to the Future' Honors the Past With Soundtrack Reissue Next Story Prev Story 10 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
It's been 30 years since Marty McFly and Doc Brown rode their DeLorean into cult fame. Now, in celebration of Back to the Future day, a Back to the Future: Music from the Motion Picture Soundtrack has arrived.   Hollywood Reporter.
